field.name: ok_label_ids
field.domain: [('state', 'in', ('available', 'control')), ('product_id', '=', product_id), ('quality_label_ids', 'not in', quarantine_label_ids), ('quality_label_ids', 'not in', hs_label_ids), ('location_id', '=', location_id)]
